sample_rfp_prompt: I need 50 Dell XPS 15 laptops with 32GB RAM and 1TB SSD. Budget is $100,000. Delivery required by end of next month.
sample_vendor_email:
Hi Team,

Here is our quote for the Dell laptops.

Price: $1,800 per unit.
Total: $90,000.
Delivery: 3 weeks.
Warranty: 3 years onsite.

Thanks,
Alice

comparison_output_example.justification: TechWorld offers a better warranty (3 years vs 1 year) and is under budget.
